participant_2.background:
I want to learn how to manage my diabetes better so that I can continue to enjoy my work and my life.
I like driving my red Impala.
my favorite team is the raptors.
i want people to think i am cool.
I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well.

content.text: Likewise! What do you like to do?
I like to drive my red Impala, I'm passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, and I want people to think I'm cool.

That sounds really cool! I'm an East Asian woman who grew up in a small town in the Midwest. I volunteer at my local animal shelter, value monogamy in relationships, and want to use my passion for God to inspire others.
That's so interesting! I've always wanted to visit the Midwest. What's it like there?
It's beautiful! There are lots of cornfields and small towns. The people are very friendly and down-to-earth.
That sounds like a great place to live! I'm from Toronto, Canada. What's it like there?
Toronto is a great city! It's very diverse and there's always something to do. The food scene is amazing and the people are very friendly.
It sounds like we're both from great places!
